akn:section.akn:heading: District of Columbia Sentencing and Criminal Code Revision Commission.

akn:content.akn:p: The District of Columbia Sentencing and Criminal Code Revision Commission (“Commission”) is established as an independent agency within the District of Columbia government, consistent with the meaning of the term “independent agency” as provided in § 1-603.01(13).
In addition to the duties required under § 3-101.01, the Commission shall perform the following duties:
The Commission is designated as a criminal justice agency for purposes of accessing offender and sentencing related data required to perform the duties specified under this chapter.
